best_practice_option: Mechanisms exist to identify responsibility and ownership
remediation_description: Implement a process to clearly define ownership and responsibilities for key business and technical roles.
remediation_solution: A RACI (Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, Informed) matrix should be created mapping business and technical roles to key processes and assets. This will identify clear owners responsible for each area. Regular attestations should be performed to keep this matrix up to date.
remediation_general_considerations: Consider automating the attestation process through a workflow in a CMDB system. Make sure to communicate changes in ownership clearly across the organization.
effort_estimate: 2 weeks for initial matrix definition and implementation of attestation workflow
